Articles.Content:
Title says it all. I'm looking for a stockalike 6 meter cargo bay for the stock MK2 fuselage system. I build a lot of fighter jets and I like them to look nice so I use internal payloads instead of external hard-points wherever possible. My problem with the current parts is that the 4m bay is a bit too short for my needs, and the 8m bay is a bit too long. So I either need a 6m bay, or a 2m bay to slap on the end of a 4m bay.

If you can either:

1.) Be awesome and make one and let me focus on building.

2.) Point me somewhere I can find one.

3.) Or point me somewhere that I can learn to make one.

I'd love you forever and ever.

Thanks.
